# Test Markdown Vault

This is a test markdown vault for E2E testing.
It contains real markdown files that can be used to test the file watching and graph visualization functionality.

## Structure

- `concepts/` - Core concepts and ideas
- `projects/` - Project-related notes
- `daily/` - Daily notes and logs

## Links

See [[concepts/introduction]] for getting started.
Check out [[projects/main-project]] for the main project details.
